name: AtBusiness Communications
overview: AtBusiness Communications Oyj engages in the development and delivery of integral, customer relationship management, and business intelligence solutions. It offers software solutions for management, sales, marketing, customer service, and logistics. The companyâ€™s customers include companies in the services, public sector, industries, insurance/finance, and commercial sectors. AtBusiness Communications Oyj was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland. The company has additional offices in Kuopio, Finland; and St Petersburg, Russia.

milestones.description: AtBusiness Oy acquires Trainer's House-IT Unit from Trainers' House Oyj.
